messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's pets has developed lizard level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Im a cute little catgirl wanna yiff and stuff? lol xd

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, not more than 15 [REDACTED] have migrated into the maintenance tunnels.
